name: KGTC
description:
In KGTC, the player is an English police officer from 1900 who needs to prevent anarchists from blowing up the Titanic's construction site.

KGTC is a Rail-Shooter using Kinect and 3 Wiimotes. The player hides behind physical covers to protect against ennemies shoots. Also works with PSMove.
